thread.title: BLM Colorado offers wild horses and burros for adoption in Florence | Local News Stories | montrosepress.com
thread.title_full: BLM Colorado offers wild horses and burros for adoption in Florence | Local News Stories | montrosepress.com

author: Special to the MDP
title: BLM Colorado offers wild horses and burros for adoption in Florence | Local News Stories | montrosepress.com
text: The Bureau of Land Management will host a wild horse and burro adoption Oct. 11-12, 2024, at Pathfinder Regional Park in Florence. The horses and burros will be available for adoption to individuals who are eligible and can provide good homes.
